analysis.description:
Contract locking ether found in /unique_chucks/44/0x888934de736b7f5244f006a655f3bcd71ef0979d.sol:
	Contract Oryx has payable functions:
	 - fallback (/unique_chucks/44/0x888934de736b7f5244f006a655f3bcd71ef0979d.sol#216)
	But does not have a function to withdraw the ether

Detected issues with version pragma in /unique_chucks/44/0x888934de736b7f5244f006a655f3bcd71ef0979d.sol:
	- pragma solidity^0.4.18 (/unique_chucks/44/0x888934de736b7f5244f006a655f3bcd71ef0979d.sol#1): it allows old versions
Parameter '_newOwner' of Owned.transferOwnership (/unique_chucks/44/0x888934de736b7f5244f006a655f3bcd71ef0979d.sol#87) is not in mixedCase
